QuestData.Title: Your Personal Assistant
QuestData.Description:
Here in Hero's Rest, we have a beacon that is the fastest way to draw the Polemarch's attention.
It has been quite some time since we have used it, and I am afraid that it has fallen into disrepair.
I authorize you to receive a steward companion during your stay here in Bastion.
I will call for some to convene here. You may select one to aid you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Select a steward to aid you, then return to Kalisthene.
QuestData.RewardText: Whenever you need assistance, your steward will be available to provide many services.
